control_attributes.control_description: The organization employs a penetration testing process that includes [Assignment: organization-defined frequency], pronounced attempts to bypass or circumvent security controls associated with physical access points to the facility.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization monitors physical intrusion alarms and surveillance equipment.

Control Statement: The organization employs a penetration testing process that includes [Assignment: organization-defined frequency], pronounced attempts to bypass or circumvent security controls associated with physical access points to the facility.
